Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Minor
b) Defect Observed: Bleed air temperature exceedance. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Contamination ingress through damaged seal assembly
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Air Conditioning component. Inspection
revealed damage to critical components.
c) Remedial Measures Repair damaged area using approved repair scheme
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Update technical documentation with lessons learned

Remarks: Thorough investigation completed. Preventive actions recommended.
